alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 12 at 1:51PM MST until January 14 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches with higher amounts over the peaks. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Check road conditions before heading out. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Low visibility from blowing snow possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
